entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Powell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Powell River Airport 3:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 5.8°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
